name: SokoBelt
description:
Evil Corp is at it again with their new kids toy "Beards". What the public doesn't know is they are sentient. You are one who managed to escape; Only to return to lead your fellow Beards to safety.

  • left-click: select / place piece
  • left-hold: move placed piece
  • right-click: rotate piece
  • middle-click: remove piece
  • shift: fast forward
  • escape: pause

Entry to the 2022 Lisp Game Jam, source on Codeberg

By Joel Kuntz and Phil Hagelberg, art by Henning Larsen
